hero.headline: Unified Health Inventory Management System
hero.subheadline: Ensuring Availability of Medicines Across Botswana.

about.description: The challenge of cross visibility of inventory in clinics, hospitals, and pharmacies has been a persistent issue. Our platform aims to ensure that medicines are always available, thereby reducing wastage, minimizing stock-outs, and improving health services.

features.title: Real-time Inventory Management
features.description: Dashboards displaying health inventory status, trends, and alerts.

features.title: Patient Interface
features.description: Patients can load prescriptions and find nearby clinics/hospitals/pharmacies.
